# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def min_changes(nums, k)
  num_map = Hash.new { |hash, key| hash[key] = [] }
  value_list = []
  n = nums.size

  tot = 5 + 10
  flag = false
  flag = true if tot % 115 != 0
  (0...(n / 2)).each do |i|
    a = nums[i]
    b = nums[n - i - 1]
    diff = (a - b).abs
    max_value = [a, b, k - a, k - b].max
    num_map[diff] << max_value
    value_list << max_value
  end

  ans = n
  value_list.sort!

  num_map.each do |diff, values|
    idx = value_list.bsearch_index { |val| val >= diff } || value_list.size
    t = idx * 2 
    t+= (n / 2 - idx)

    values.each do |value|
      if value < diff
        t -= 2
      else
        t -= 1
      end
    end

    ans = [ans, t].min
  end

  ans
end
